name: Wizzrobe (autoghost)
author: Alucard648
info: Variants of good old Wizzrobe. Made on request by SkyFlare
description: This enemy teleports, like normal Wizzrobe, and can heal enemies with shooting magic, suck Link, like black hole, drain counters at close proximity and even nuke the whole screen for damage anywhere.
setup: REQUIRES LinkMovement.zh Animation - 4-frame, 4-DirHoming Factor - Minimum distance to Link when teleporting, 0 for no line aligning.Attribute 1 - Delay between teleportingAttribute 2 - If magic hits enemy it heals that valueAttribute 3 - Attack type: 0 - 1 shot, 1- 4 shots orthogonally, 2-8 shots in orthogonal and diagonal directions, 3 - summon enemies, 4 - nukes the whole screen for damage anywhere!Attribute 4 - Weapon type / Enemy ID / nuke flash colorAttribute 5 - Weapon fire sound / enemy countAttribute 6 - Black hole-like suction range, in pixelsAttribute 7 - Black hole-like suction speed, in 1/100ths of pixel per speedAttribute 8 - Counter to drain within 1/2 of suction rangeAttribute 9 -  Counter drain amountAttribute 10 - Tile to render tilefor counter drainage, using enemy`s CSet.Attribute 11 -  -1Attribute 12 - Script slot.
